## Example

```{r example}
library(testbindrows)
library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
```

```{r}
x <- df_special(x = 1, y = 2)
y <- data.frame(x = 1, y = 2)

bind_rows(x, y)

# it is the right class
class(bind_rows(x, y))

# reverse order calls normal data frame method
class(bind_rows(y, x))
```

```{r}
x <- df_next_method(x = 1, y = 2)
y <- data.frame(x = 1, y = 2)

bind_rows(x, y)

# it is the right class
class(bind_rows(x, y))

# reverse order calls normal data frame method
class(bind_rows(y, x))
```
